label: TYPE
description: This field indicates the type of transfer performed.

label: ACCOUNTNUMBER
description: This field indicates the account to or from which the funds are transferred.

label: IDTYPE
description: This field indicates which type of account is affected.

label: ID
description: This field indicates the ID of the account to or from which the funds are transferred.

label: EXTLOANACCOUNT
description: This field stores the number of the external loan account.

label: PERCENT
description: This field indicates the percentage of the dividend to be transferred.

label: AMOUNT
description: This field indicates the amount that should be transferred.

label: AMOUNTOPTION
description: This field is used only for Loan Transfer records to credit card loans that have the Transfer Type field set to (3) Automatic Payment.

label: MINIMUMBALANCE
description: This field is used for share sweeps; it stores the minimum balance the share can reach.

label: MAXIMUMBALANCE
description: This field is used for share sweeps; it stores the maximum balance the share can reach.

label: SWEEPMINIMUM
description: This field stores the minimum amount to transfer in a share sweep.

label: SWEEPFEE
description: This field is used for MBS sweeps; it stores the amount you want to charge for sweeps.

label: SWEEPFEEIDTYPE
description: This field is used for MBS sweeps; it determines whether the sweep will be charged to a share or loan.

label: SWEEPFEEID
description: This field is used for MBS sweeps; it specified the ID of the Share or Loan record that will be charged for the sweep.

label: RECORDCHANGEDATE
description: This field stores the system date when you create, change or save the Transfer record.

label: FREQUENCY
description: This field determines the frequency of the transfer.

label: DAY1
description: This fields determines the date on which automatic transfers should occur for annual, semiannual, quarterly, monthly, semimonthly, or bimonthly transfers.

label: DAY2
description: This fields determines the date on which automatic transfers should occur for semi-monthly transfers.

label: NEXTDATE
description: This field stores the date of the next automatic share transfer.

label: LASTDATE
description: This field indicated the date on which you want the final transfer to be made.

label: EFFECTIVEDATE
description: This field stores the date on which the transfer record should take effect.

label: EXPIRATIONDATE
description: This field stores the date on which the Transfer record is no longer valid.

label: PAYMENTTYPE
description: This field indicates how a payment should be handled when transferring funds from a share to a loan.

label: MATURITYCHECK
description: Used for Share records, this field indicates whether the system should issue a check when the certificate matures.

label: MATURITYCHECK
description: Used for Share records, this field indicates whether the system should issue a check when the certificate matures.

label: LOCATOR
description: This field value in each record is unique for each member account.

label: REGE
description: This field indicates whether automatic share transfers and payroll EFT transfers are designated as governed by Reg E.
